name: Geoactio
tagline: We are your R & D department.
description: GeoActio is a company of technological character specialized in the design and development of innovative solutions created from the integration of multiple technologies. The accumulated experience in the world of radiocommunications, intelligent transport systems, mobile devices and web platforms has generated a wide knowledge on which reliable solutions are supported.

locations.address: Polígono Industrial Mocholí Plaza CEIN, 1 Planta baja
